tool.name: OMERO Dataset to Plate
tool.command:
#if $test_username != "" export OMERO_USER="$test_username" && export OMERO_PASSWORD="$test_password" && #end if
python '$__tool_directory__/omero_dataset_to_plate.py' @HOST_PORT@ --dataset_id '$dataset_id' --log_file '$log' --mapping_file '$mapping' @SESSION_ID@ '$delete_dataset'

param.name: dataset_id
param.label: Dataset ID to convert to a plate

has_text.text: Images from Dataset 2 successfully added to Plate 1

tool.help: Description ----------- - Tool to convert an existing dataset to a plate in OMERO - The tool is taking as input a mapping tabular file with Filename and Well Position: +------------+---------------+ | Filename | Well | +============+===============+ | image1.tiff| A2 | +------------+---------------+ | image2.tiff| B5 | +------------+---------------+ | image3.tiff| H12 | +------------+---------------+ @SECURITY_DISCLAIMER@
